item.title: 苹果重塑视频播客，行业转向视觉化
item.description: 苹果公司正在对其Apple Podcasts的视频内容进行全面升级，此举是整个行业向视觉化转型的一部分——这种曾经仅限于音频的媒介正迎来变革浪潮。【原文：Apple Inc. is revamping its video offering in Apple Podcasts as part of a broader industry shift toward visuals in the once audio-only medium.】

item.title: SpaceX将参与五角大楼无人驾驶无人机技术竞赛
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX及其全资子公司xAI正参与五角大楼一项保密竞赛，旨在研发语音控制的自主无人机群集技术。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX and wholly owned subsidiary xAI are competing in a secretive new Pentagon contest to produce voice-controlled, autonomous drone swarming technology, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔力推欧元计价稳定币用于支付
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆·纳格尔表示，以欧元计价的稳定币可成为低成本国际汇款的有效工具，有助于补充欧洲央行推动数字共同货币的举措。【原文：Euro-denominated stablecoins can be a valuable tool for cheap international transfers, supplementing the European Central Bank’s push for a digital common currency, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 维托尔加入南非液化天然气发电项目联合体
item.description: 维托集团作为联合体成员，正向南非提出一项天然气发电项目提案，该国正寻求替换老化的燃煤电厂。【原文：Vitol Group is part of a consortium proposing a gas-to-power project in South Africa, as the country looks to replace aging coal stations.】

item.title: 德国正逐步推进禁止16岁以下青少年使用社交媒体的政策
item.description: 德国似乎准备对社交媒体实施年龄限制，此举可能加剧与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的紧张关系。【原文：Germany looks poised to introduce age restrictions on social media in a move likely to increase tensions with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 布雷曼首秀成为焦点，新西兰联储料将维持利率不变
item.description: 新西兰新任央行行长安娜·布雷曼本周成为焦点人物，预计将维持利率不变。随着她应对顽固的强劲通胀，市场关注点转向她对经济前景的评估。【原文：New Zealand’s new central bank Governor Anna Breman takes center stage this week and is expected to keep interest rates unchanged, with attention turning to her assessment of the economic outlook as she grapples with stubbornly strong inflation.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金买入十年最多亚洲股票
item.description: 上周，亚洲新兴及发达市场迎来了对冲基金最大规模的净买入，创下高盛集团Prime Services交易台自2016年开始追踪该数据以来的最高纪录。该地区受益于市场对人工智能基础设施企业的乐观预期。【原文：Emerging and developed Asian markets saw the largest net-buying by hedge funds last week since Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Prime Services trading desk began tracking the data in 2016, as the region benefits from the optimism for AI infrastructure firms.】

item.title: 激进投资者Third Point增持Indra股份，敦促董事会收购EM&E
item.description: Third Point LLC已入股西班牙科技与国防企业英德拉系统公司，并支持董事长安赫尔·埃斯克里巴诺收购较小竞争对手的计划。【原文：Third Point LLC has taken a stake in Spanish technology and defense company Indra Sistemas SA and is throwing its support behind Chairman Ángel Escribano’s plan to buy a smaller rival.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚去年末经济增速低于预期
item.description: 去年年底，哥伦比亚经济增速远低于预期，因通胀率超标及高利率抑制了需求。【原文：Colombia’s economy slowed much more than expected at the end of last year as above-target inflation and high interest rates weighed on demand.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司巨额债券发售推动墨西哥当月债券发行创历史新高
item.description: 墨西哥国家石油公司上周发行了315亿比索（约合18亿美元）的本币债券——这是该国本币市场有史以来规模最大的债券发行——推动墨西哥当月债券发行量创下历史新高，尽管二月份才过半。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos’s sale of 31.5 billion pesos ($1.8 billion) in local currency debt last week — the biggest ever in local markets — pushed monthly sales in Mexico to a record, even though it is only half way through February.】

item.title: 南非储备银行希望将基准利率用于贷款定价
item.description: 南非央行正寻求以基准利率取代商业银行用于定价数万亿兰特贷款的主要参考利率——基准利率。【原文：South Africa’s central bank is seeking to replace prime, the main reference commercial banks use to price trillions of rands of loans, with its benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 法国电力集团警告：太阳能与风能激增正加剧核电成本压力
item.description: 法国电力公司表示，随着太阳能和风能发电量的增长，其核反应堆的设备磨损和维护成本正在增加。当电力需求不足时，这些核反应堆被迫降低发电量。【原文：Electricite de France SA said growing solar and wind generation was increasing equipment wear and maintenance costs at its nuclear reactors, which are forced to reduce output when power demand is insufficient.】

item.title: 赫伯罗特以42亿美元收购竞争对手希姆航运公司
item.description: 德国航运公司赫伯罗特宣布，已签署协议收购以色列竞争对手Zim综合航运服务有限公司。【原文：Hapag-Lloyd AG has signed a deal to buy Israeli competitor Zim Integrated Shipping Services Ltd , the German shipper said.】

item.title: 英国里夫斯将受益于债务利息下降
item.description: 蕾切尔·里夫斯有望首次因英国债务利息支出下降而获得意外之财，这是她自2024年7月担任财政大臣以来首次出现这种情况。【原文：Rachel Reeves is on course to secure a windfall from the falling cost of the UK’s debt-interest payments for the first time since she became chancellor of the exchequer in July 2024.】

item.title: 索马里百万民众面临饥荒，因资金枯竭
item.description: 索马里一家主要国内慈善机构称，由于缺乏应对灾难的资金，该国约100万人正面临严重饥饿威胁。【原文：One million people in Somalia are under threat of severe hunger amid a lack of funding to tackle disasters, according to a leading domestic charity.】

item.title: 苹果将于3月4日举行新品发布会，Mac系列产品将迎来更新
item.description: 苹果公司周一宣布将于3月4日举行新品发布会，该公司正准备在未来几周内发布多款新设备。【原文：Apple Inc. said on Monday it is holding a product launch on March 4, with the company preparing to announce several new devices in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 黄金期权交易员在市场回调后仍加码押注看涨
item.description: 一些坚定的黄金多头正无视贵金属的历史性回调，坚守立场，期待其再次飙升至前所未有的高度。【原文：Some staunch gold bulls are shrugging off the precious metal’s historic correction and holding out for another surge to unheard-of levels.】

item.title: 五角大楼即将与Anthropic公司断绝关系，报道称
item.description: 据Axios报道，五角大楼正考虑与Anthropic公司断绝合作关系，并可能将这家人工智能公司列为供应链风险企业。此前五角大楼因受限于技术使用方式而感到沮丧。【原文：The Pentagon is close to cutting ties with Anthropic and may label the artificial intelligence company a supply chain risk after becoming frustrated with restrictions on how it can use the technology, Axios reported.】

item.title: 欧元区财长推动单一货币发挥更大作用
item.description: 随着美国总统特朗普搅动市场、美元走弱，欧元区财长们正推动扩大单一货币在全球的作用。【原文：Euro-area finance chiefs are pushing to expand the single currency’s global role, as US President Donald Trump roils markets and the US dollar weakens.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克的X平台遭遇大范围服务中断
item.description: 据监测网站Downdetector称，周一有数千名用户报告无法访问埃隆·马斯克的社交媒体平台X。【原文：Thousands of users reported issues accessing Elon Musk’s social media platform X on Monday, according to monitoring website Downdetector.】

item.title: 奥地利希望下任欧洲央行行长人选按常规时间表推进
item.description: 奥地利财政部长马库斯·马尔特鲍尔表示，他支持在任命下一任欧洲央行行长时遵循标准时间表。【原文：Austrian Finance Minister Markus Marterbauer said he backs sticking with the standard timeline in appointing the next European Central Bank president.】

item.title: 世界银行削减肯尼亚住房项目的商业资金
item.description: 世界银行已将其计划帮助肯尼亚从商业贷款机构筹集资金用于该国住房和土地改革项目的金额削减了近三分之二。【原文：The World Bank has slashed by almost two thirds the amount of money it planned to help Kenya mobilize from commercial lenders for the nation’s housing and land reform programs.】

item.title: 阿伯丁称78亿欧元收购要约低估公司价值
item.description: 阿伯丁集团将对某财团收购InPost SA的要约投反对票，称该提案未能反映这家波兰包裹柜运营商的内在价值及长期增长轨迹。【原文：Aberdeen Group Plc will vote against a consortium’s buyout offer for InPost SA, saying the proposal fails to reflect the Polish parcel locker operator’s intrinsic value or long-term growth trajectory.】

item.title: 法国认为在提升欧元全球地位方面应保持谨慎
item.description: 法国政府对欧洲寻求增强欧元的国际作用感到犹豫不决，并呼吁评估经济风险。【原文：The French government is getting cold feet about Europe seeking to strengthen the international role of the euro and calling for an assessment of the economic risks.】

item.title: 巴塞尔协议将对美国银行实施新的抵押贷款资本要求
item.description: 随着美联储即将公布与《巴塞尔协议III》相关的银行资本提案，美国贷款机构即将面临新的抵押贷款要求。【原文：US lenders are poised to see new mortgage-loan requirements as the Federal Reserve comes closer to unveiling a long-awaited bank capital proposal tied to Basel III.】

item.title: 银行筹备出售巴斯夫涂料40亿欧元收购债务
item.description: 银行正准备出售约40亿欧元（47亿美元）的债务，为凯雷集团收购巴斯夫涂料业务提供融资。【原文：Banks are preparing to sell about €4 billion ($4.7 billion) of debt to finance Carlyle Inc.’s acquisition of BASF SE’s coatings business.】

item.title: 欧洲煤炭期货在俄罗斯港口遭袭后延续涨势
item.description: 欧洲煤炭期货连续第四日上涨，此前俄罗斯黑海一处重要煤炭出口港口遭遇无人机袭击，而主要出口国印尼正收紧供应。【原文：European coal futures climbed for a fourth day, after a drone attack on a Russian Black Sea port that handles sizable exports of the fuel and as major shipper Indonesia tightens supply.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率意外放缓，央行利率决议前夕
item.description: 尼日利亚1月份通胀率意外放缓，为政策制定者下周重启降息周期创造了空间。【原文：Nigerian inflation unexpectedly slowed in January, providing room for policymakers to resume their rate-cutting cycle next week.】

item.title: 里夫斯可能陷入布鲁塞尔、蝙蝠和蝾螈的两难境地
item.description: 在蕾切尔·里夫斯的优先事项排序中，新建住房比阻碍工程的"微型蜗牛"等野生动物更为重要。但这位财政大臣虽屡屡抨击英国对自然界的严格保护措施，其与欧盟的和解进程却可能迫使其做出令人难堪的政策逆转。【原文：In Rachel Reeves’ hierarchy of priorities, building new homes is more important than “microscopic snails” and other wildlife standing in the way. But while the Chancellor of the Exchequer has repeatedly railed against Britain’s strict protections for the natural world, her rapprochement with the European Union could soon force an embarrassing U-turn.】

item.title: 堡垒资本最新私募债务基金力邀保险公司入伙
item.description: 据知情人士透露，堡垒投资集团正在为其最新基金增添一项保险公司友好的特性，该基金主要投资于直接企业贷款。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is adding an insurer-friendly feature to its latest fund, which will primarily invest in direct corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】
